array.name: poetry
array.item: Hold fast to dreams \n紧紧抓住梦想，
For if dreams die \n梦想若是消亡
Life is a broken-winged bird \n生命就象鸟儿折了翅膀
That can never fly. \n再也不能飞翔
Hold fast to dreams \n紧紧抓住梦想，
For when dreams go \n梦想若是消丧
Life is a barren field \n生命就象贫瘠的荒野，
Frozen only with snow v \n雪覆冰封，万物不再生
The world in the morning to get everything \n世界在清晨获取万物
And you lose the world in the early morning \n而你在清晨失去世界
Don\'t let the early morning and then go \n不要让清晨随之而去

resources.string: Using psychohistory, Seldon mathematically determines what he calls The Seldon Plan—a plan to determine the right time and place to set up a new society, one that would replace the collapsing Galactic Empire by sheer force of social pressure, but over only a thousand-year time span, rather than the ten-to-thirty-thousand-year time span that would normally have been required, and thus reduce the human suffering from living in a time of barbarism. The Foundation is placed on Terminus, a resource-poor planet entirely populated by scientists and their families. The planet—or so Seldon claimed—was originally occupied to create the Encyclopedia Galactica, a vast compilation of the knowledge of a dying galactic empire.
In reality, Terminus had a much larger role in his Plan, which larger role he had to conceal from its inhabitants at first.
I am trying to create test application similar to Facebook chat heads.
